Reputation Manager Rapidus: Tell me what you want, and if you are worthy I will help you. If you have already "bestowed them with a special ability", "top-grade weapons and armor" can be enhanced "beyond A-Grade" especially for PvP combat. Once a multi-user item is specialized, you will still be able to enchant the item. However, you cannot refine, crystallize, convert or add an attribute to it." Think carefully before making a decision...
